author: Rory Sullivan, Rory Sullivan
title: Coronavirus: Smokers found to be worse affected by disease as Britons urged to put down cigarettes
description: Health agency cites study which says smokers with virus 14 times more likely to have it severely
content:
Smokers are more likely to develop severe coronavirus symptoms if they contract the disease, Public Health England (PHE) has said. 
Professor John Newton, Public Health England's director of health, encouraged people to stop smoking both for their own health… [+1476 chars]
